name: bdayrn

body.origin:
|- wceq(crn(cbday), con0)
-| wfo(cbday, csur, con0)
-| wi(wfo(cbday, csur, con0), wceq(crn(cbday), con0))
body.pretty:
⊢ ran(bday)= On
⊣ (bday : No ↠ On)
⊣ ((bday : No ↠ On)→ ran(bday)= On)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(crn(cbday), con0)
-| wfo(cbday, csur, con0)
-| wi(wfo(cbday, csur, con0), wceq(crn(cbday), con0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ran(bday)= On
⊣ (bday : No ↠ On)
⊣ ((bday : No ↠ On)→ ran(bday)= On)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(crn(cbday), con0)
-| wi(wfo(cbday, csur, con0), wceq(crn(cbday), con0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ran(bday)= On
⊣ ((bday : No ↠ On)→ ran(bday)= On)

comment: The birthday function's range is ` On ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 14-Jun-2011.)
